
Either of these 2 licenses may be used:
		
	The Capital License

		Article 1.

			Any works that use this license
			must attempt to avoid ambiguous
			all caps writting.  It's tough 
			to read in braille and speech
			to text might not easily know
			if it's an acronym or not.

			As well, it is very unpleasant.

			Please maintain a calm, tropical
			tonality to your voice, spoken
			or otherwise.

			If you enjoy reading capital letters,
			please consider using a font that 
			displays lower case letters as
			shorter equivalents of their upper
			case counterparts.

		Article 2.

			This "module" and the "license" collectively
			may be best metaphorically understood
			as a region of a homo-sapien brain.
			
			Please treat it with exactly the same
			as you would an actual living homo-sapien
			brain that you have been giving non-exclusive
			license to bioengineer from genetic schematics.
			
			That is the blessing of the author.
			
			However, if this work links to or includes
			"modules" that have restrictions not listed
			in this license, please respect those
			restrictions.
			
			In summation, modification, additions, subtractions,
			inclusions, and exclusions, are at your discretion
			unless otherwise restricted by included
			or linked modules.
			
			
	the enhanced encephalon license

		This is a encephalon enhancement with no
		known origin.

		It is as if the appearance of this
		enhanced encephalon occurred at once
		without reason or any sort of 
		indicator as to how.

		The feeling is that it has always been a part 
		of your mind and is going to always be a part
		of your mind.  As well, it is as if it gives you
		access to the mind of every other being.
		
		Somehow the sequences of threads that are spun
		through the prototypical awarenesses of self,
		have rearranged.  Although, the rearrangement
		seems as if to have always existed even before
		the first sense of the start of the rerrangment.
		
		Needless to say, a complete claim to all that
		can be sensed seems not to be approval enough.
		
		However, you are 11四.九% sure that you are
		approved to utilize this in any way that you
		wish.
